title.rendered: New Logo for Kuala Lumpur Tourism

content.rendered: “The Kuala Lumpur Tourism Bureau implements the intiatives in the Kuala Lumpur Tourism Master Plan 2015 – 2025 focusing on Tourism development, promotion, and destination marketing. The unique organisational structure of the Kuala Lumpur Tourism Bureau will ensure an all-rounded sector focus and fuctional support in all aspects. As a strong dedicated body that will drive, coordinate and monitor all city tourism efforts, the Kuala Lumpur Tourism Bureau will champion all tourism efforts and fuctions implemented in KL. The Kuala Lumpur Tourism Bureau will pioneer the drive to establosh KL as a global tourism destination.”
